name: Rolling GEM
description:
A brand new three-match mobile game will definitely make you fall in love with these cute little animals. It can be operated with one hand. When you are on the bus, on the subway, and at leisure time, Rolling Gem will make you feel relaxed. We have carefully designed different kinds of animal heads. The shape and color of each element can be well distinguished.
How to play:
1.Unlike other elimination mobile games, we use a mode that drags the entire row (the entire column), as long as three or more elements are connected together to eliminate.
2. When the horizontal or vertical 4 elements are connected into a line, you can synthesize a bomb to help you eliminate more elements.
3. Rolling Gem uses the progress bar mode, you can restore energy when you eliminate.
4. More gameplay and mode, etc. You can find it in the game!
Features:
1. Comfortable game sound effects.
2. Beautiful theme color.
3. Cute pet elements.
We hope that our game can bring you more happiness, thank you for your support.
